data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I'm looking for a better name, but since there's already a
    Syndication:: namespace... suggestions?

    Syndication::ESF uses an interface similar to that of XML::RSS so
    users of that module can easily adapt. It has the same ability to
    add items, channel data, etc without the RSS specific stuff like
    namespaces.

    ESF is unofficially an "easy syndication format." Simple text, with
    tab delimited fields. A few people export this format along with
    their RSS feeds.

    More info on the format can be found here:
    http://www.aquarionics.com/article/name/esf
